lead_paragraph: GENTRY--Jeff D.,Jr. There are not enough words to describe what we lost this Sunday. Jeff D Gentry, Jr. was born on September 15, 1958 in Dallas, Texas and died March 20, 2016 in a skiing accident at Snowbird Ski Resort in Alta, Utah. He graduated from the Greenhill School in Dallas Texas, and later from the University of Utah in 1984 with degrees in Geology and Geological Engineering. He was an entrepreneur and an oil, gas and mining innovator. He was a member of the Alta Club, Mensa Club, an avid collector of vintage race cars, and was also a passionate skier. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GENTRY, JEFF D.

snippet: GENTRY--Jeff D.,Jr. There are not enough words to describe what we lost this Sunday. Jeff D Gentry, Jr. was born on September 15, 1958 in Dallas, Texas and died March 20, 2016 in a skiing accident at Snowbird Ski Resort in Alta, Utah. He graduated from the Greenhill School in Dallas Texas, and later from the University of Utah in 1984 with degrees in Geology and Geological Engineering. He was an entrepreneur and an oil, gas and mining innovator. He was a member of the Alta Club, Mensa Club, an avid collector of vintage race cars, and was also a passionate skier. 1/3
